text: Micrablepharus maximiliani is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is found in Brazil, Paraguay, Bolivia, and Peru. ==References== Category:Micrablepharus Category:Reptiles of Bolivia Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Reptiles of Paraguay Category:Reptiles of Peru Category:Reptiles described in 1862 Category:Taxa named by Johannes Theodor Reinhardt Category:Taxa named by Christian Frederik Lütken
title: Micrablepharus maximiliani
